Description

This class represents a window for adding an employee to a specified store.

This class represents the application's administration panel.

This class represents a window that prompts the user to enter an ID.

The askIDInventory class represents a window allowing the user to enter an inventory ID.

The AskIDInventoryTest class provides JUnit tests for the askIDInventory class.

The askIDItem class represents a window allowing the user to enter an item ID.

The AskIDItemTest class provides JUnit tests for the askIDItem class.

The askIDItem class represents a window allowing the user to enter an item ID.
askIDStoreTest
The AskIDStoreTest class provides JUnit tests for the askIDStore class.
askIdTest
The AskIdTest test class tests the isValidNumber method of the askId class.
connexionBDD
The connexionBDD class provides methods to test and obtain a connection to a MySQL database.
connexionbddtest
The connectionBDDTest class provides methods for testing and obtain a connection to a MySQL database.
createItem
This class represents a window for creating a new item.
createStore
This class represents a window for creating a new store.
deleteItem
This class represents a window for deleting an item from the database.
deleteStore
This class represents a window for deleting a store.
deleteUser
This class represents the window allowing a user to delete his account.
HyperlinkText
A custom JLabel representing a hyperlink text that performs an action when pressed.
HyperlinkTextTest
Test class for the HyperlinkText class.
intFieldId
A custom text field class for entering integer identifiers.
isNumberValid
Utility class to check if a string is a valid number.
LastID
The LastID class provides a method to obtain the last ID of a table in a database.
lastIdTest
The LastIdTest class provides JUnit tests for the LastID class.
listAllStore
This class represents a window displaying a list of all stores.
listAllUsers
This class represents a window displaying a list of all registered users.
listEmployeStore
This class represents a window allowing an employee to view information related to one or more stores.
listItemsFromStore
This class represents a window displaying the list of items in a specific store inventory.
listPersonAcess
This class represents a window displaying the list of users with access to a specific specific inventory.
listPersonAcessTest
This class provides JUnit tests for the listPersonAcess class.
LoginFrame
This class represents the application's login window.
loginFrameTest
Unit tests for the LoginFrame class.
Main
The Main class contains the main method of the program.
MainTest
The MainTest class contains JUnit tests for the Main class.
messageAdmin
This class represents the message administration window in the admin center.
messageUser
This class represents the message user window in the user panel.
popMenu
This class provides a static method to create a context menu with an option to close the session and log out.
popMenuTest
Test class for the popMenu class.
registerFrame
This class represents the registration window.
sendMessage
The `sendMessage` class represents a graphical user interface for sending messages.
TextFieldPassword
An extension of JPasswordField with a custom graphical style.
TextFieldPasswordTest
Tests for the TextFieldPassword class.
TextFieldPseudo
A custom text field class for entering pseudonyms.
TextFieldTitle
Custom JTextField for title input with rounded borders and styling.
TextFieldTitleTest
The TextFieldTitleTest class contains unit tests for the TextFieldTitle class.
TextFieldUsername
Custom JTextField for username input with rounded borders and styling.
Toaster
The Toaster class provides a simple way to display toast messages on a JPanel.
ToasterTest
JUnit test class for the Toaster class.
UIUtils
Utility class for common UI-related constants and methods.
updateItem
The updateItem class represents a Swing window for updating an item's information.
updateRole
The `updateRole` class represents a window for updating user roles, specifically making a user an admin.
updateUser
This class represents a window allowing an employee to update his information.
userPanel
This class represents the main panel for a user.
userPanelTest
Test class for the userPanel class, covering its initialization, menu bar actions, and background image loading.
verifEmail
The EmailValidator class provides a method to validate an email address using a regular expression.
verifEmailTest
Test class for the verifEmail class.
verifPassword
The PasswordValidator class provides a method to validate the strength of a password using a regular expression.
verifPasswordTest
Test class for the verifPassword class.
whiteListUser
This class represents a window allowing an administrator to add users to the whitelist.
